tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE StoreLocations (
    store_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location_point GEOGRAPHY(POINT) NOT NULL,
    target_demographics TEXT,
    competitor_locations TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE store_locations (
    store_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_name VARCHAR(255),
    store_address VARCHAR(255),
    store_city VARCHAR(50),
    store_state VARCHAR(50),
    store_zipcode VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE demographic_data (
    demographic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    demographics_category VARCHAR(50),
    population INT,
    median_income DECIMAL(10,2),
    median_age INT
);

CREATE TABLE competitor_locations (
    competitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    competitor_name VARCHAR(100),
    competitor_address VARCHAR(255),
    competitor_city VARCHAR(50),
    competitor_state VARCHAR(50),
    competitor_zipcode VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE potential_store_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(50),
    demographics_data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE competitor_locations (
    competitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    competitor_name VARCHAR(50),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE customer_demographics (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    income DECIMAL(10, 2),
    gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE store_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    rating INT,
    review_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE store_locations (
    store_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    state VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL,
    zipcode VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE demographic_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_id INT REFERENCES store_locations(store_id),
    population INT,
    median_income DECIMAL,
    median_age INT,
    education_level VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE competitor_locations (
    competitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_id INT REFERENCES store_locations(store_id),
    competitor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    state VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL,
    zipcode VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE store_ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_id INT REFERENCES store_locations(store_id),
    rating INT,
    review TEXT,
    date_added DATE
);

CREATE TABLE potential_new_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    state VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL,
    zipcode VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    potential_sales DECIMAL,
    nearest_competitor_id INT REFERENCES competitor_locations(competitor_id)
);
